page.title: 15HEVER CASTLE(continued)
page.content:
Astor also altered the course of the River Eden within the grounds, constructed the power station, the stables, the home farm, the kitchen garden and several estate cottages, all in the space of three years. Hever Castle was auctioned to a group of six businessmen in 1984, but still remains open to the public.
Admission charges _________ _______ (1985) gardens _ children _ 75p; _ adults _ Â£1.50p; castle & gardens _ children _ Â£1.25p; _ adults _ Â£2.75p.
....by Robert Leppard and Matthew Wheeler.
